As the Predacons and lone trainer cleared out of the base Hellpeon 
was unable to hold back the chaochitan energy any longer. The bot 
growled loudly before his body went stiff and all the energy was 
released. Outside it would look like nothing had happened at first, 
but then three rings of Chaochitan energy would fly through the base 
causing huge explosions and slicing all throughout as a coulumn of 
energy then shot up out of the center of the base and then begean to 
grow outward but not to an extent to engulf the entire base.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> shots of all strengths and types whuzzed past Ignatius as he flew 
for his life. The Predacon attackers had him outnumbered, outgunned, 
and outout of luck. various shots struck the Eagle in flight sending 
him into a tailspin. He transformed to bot mode turning, ready to 
fire at the pursuing bots. In the distance he saw the smoke as the 
Trainers base burned to the ground. He saw Slayer, even through the 
disguise he remembered him. 
> 
> "You called me a traitor then bring this upon our unit?" The bot 
was alone, afraid, looking for someone to blame for the damage. "You 
brought them here, you dropped the defences, you destroyed everything 
we had hoped to learn. He leapt in the air flapping his wings to push 
himself higher. The shots were hitting him hard but in his state of 
mind he could't have cared. He lifted his talons fireing 25  shots 
from his talons, and two missles from his left arm at the Trainer in 
disguise.
